Button to select the previous coloring book.
Button to select the next coloring book.
Coloring Book

Main Menu - Navigate through all available coloring books. Pick one to begin coloring.

Coloring Book Page - Use the left or right arrows to navigate through the coloring pages.

Toggle between brush mode and fill-bucket mode using the bottom left button.

Use the eraser to erase colors.

Settings - Turn music on/off, visit the shop, or view production credits.

Help - View this help screen.
